ygData.subject: Hi
ygData.msgSnippet: I just joined this club. I m pretty new to Everquest. My main character is a level 3 mage with all the level 1 spells. I also have a level 2 necro but I cant
ygData.messageBody:
I just joined this club. I'm pretty new to
Everquest. My main character is a level 3 mage with all the
level 1 spells. I also have a level 2 necro but I cant
get to my guild hall cuase the hallway there is too
dark... my necro is on the PvP-teams server and if any
other fellow necro could help me on that server, your
help would be greatly appreciated. And i could also
use some cash for some spells. Well, I'll be a
regular member here. SEE YA!!!! over and out.
